index.infoSection:
### By students, for students. Free & Open Source.
TUfast is the #1 productivity tool for students at TU Dresden.
For two years, we have been working with you and the FSRs to develop the perfect product to make your everyday study life easier.

Find out more about the project on this site and install TUfast now!

content: ## Project

TUfast has come alive in May 2020 and has more than 2500 users as of 01.01.2022. The project is open-source on [GitHub](https://github.com/TUfast-TUD/TUfast_TUD) and developed by students. For two years now, we have been creating the perfect tool for your everyday student life!
### üöÄ What does TUfast do?
With TUfast you can **save up to 2000 Clicks and 90 minutes** per semester!
To do this, TUfast provides a number of features to make your everyday studies easier, such as:

- AutoLogin to all online platforms
 - Quick-access and hotkeys for many platforms
 - Supports SELMA, OPAL, jExam and many more
 - Overview of all your OPAL-courses as well as improvements for OPAL itself.
 - ... and many more that you can discover in TUfast ;)
### üîê Is TUfast secure?

The TUfast extension stores user data only locally on your device. If you uninstall the extension, all data will be deleted as well. Additionally, TUfast is currently being audited by the department of IT security of TU Dresden. Here you can find our [privacy policy](/datenschutz).
### üîÆ Whats next?
We want to make TUfast available for 5000+ students at TU Dresden and for at least one more university in Saxony by end of this year.
In addition, we are currently looking for funding and incubators.
### ‚ù§Ô∏è Supporters
The project is being supported by:

- Ms. Jantos, the eLearning coordinator of TU Dresden
 - The [DigitalAcceleratorProgramm](https://www.stifterverband.org/digitalchangemaker-accelerator) of the Stifterverband
 - Kind sponsors on [BuyMeACoffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/olihausdoerfer)
- The following FSRs:
 ***

active.name: Daniel Kluge
active.studies: Dipl.-Ing. Information Systems Engineering, TU Dresden

content: ## Jobs
The best thing about TUfast?! Software development for a real use case, a tool with 2500 users and providing a benefit for you fellow students!
Thesis or student work can also be done at TUfast, however, you will need a supervisor from uni. For possible topics be create of get inspired by our project board on GitHub!
Of course, you will get a certificat about your work and committment at TUfast, when you joing the team.
### Contact

Write us an e-mail at [frage@tu-fast.de](mailto:frage@tu-fast.de) that answers the following questions:
 1. What will be your personal ideals when developing software for TUfast? 2. Which part/topic can you best contribute at and want to work on? We will answer you mail within 5 days.
### Do I need to be able to write software to participate?

If you can not code yet, but are interested in the project, you can still join. We have many tasks that would be suitable to get into web development. Beyond that, we are also looking for students interested in project management, product communication and marketing.

If you want to take responsibility for a part of the project, you should already have experience in web development, git and writing software in a team. Experience from personal projects can also be sufficient.
### Open positions

listings.title: TUfast for MacOS/Safari
listings.content: We get many requests, to make TUfast available for Safari users. You have experience in developing for MacOS/Safari? Then do your fellow students a favor and take over the implementation!

listings.title: TUfast for mobile
listings.content: Service-Workers are the latest trend in web technologies. We want to switch to service workers, as they allow for new features and make TUfast available on mobile.

listings.title: TUfast for HTW / other Institutes of Higher Education
listings.content: As TUfast is awesome, many students of the HTW requested to make TUfast available for them! This would be a huge step for us, and requires thinking about software architecture and new implementation.

listings.title: TUfast Telemetry
listings.content: We want to collect anonymous usage data for TUfast to make the service even better. These data should be published on our website as well. Possible tools include Clickhouse or OpenTelemetry.

listings.title: Marketing
listings.content: We value marketing as a huge part of our project. Our goal is, to develop a clear brand communication and distribute TUfast to as many users as possible. You want to make experiences in Marketing and brand communication? Then its you we are looking for!

listings.title: Project management
listings.content: A team is as good as the common vision. In project management, you make sure, that this vision is communicated and achieved. This includes looking for project sponsors, communication to project stake-hoders and general project management.
